channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How the U.S. military went woke: DEI offices, women in combat and drag shows
item.description: Plug-in tanks, drag shows and physically unfit leaders promoted to boost diversity have shifted the U.S. military's focus "on the wrong things," Defen...

item.title: ‘Open Letters’ from Experts Are Often Fact-Free Propaganda
item.description: Such letters are often theatrical versions of political position papers rather than any attempt to educate the public.

item.title: The Trump Administration’s Tariff ‘Plan B’ Has an Ominous History
item.description: The White House is warning of a new Great Depression while invoking a statute that contributed to the original.

item.title: Trump administration to spend $50 million in AI research to fight childhood cancer
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday directed his administration to spend $50 million in artificial intelligence research to help fight childhood cancer.

item.title: Lessons for Republicans from the Tory Collapse
Shutdown hits D.C. tourist destinations, federal workers but essential services persist
item.description: Expect some of the best attractions the District has to offer to get shuttered in a government shutdown.

item.title: Spanberger Refuses To Condemn Male Sex Offender Using Girls’ Locker Rooms
item.description: Virginia’s Fairfax County claims there is no “probable cause” to charge Richard Cox, a Tier III registered sex offender, for allegedly exposing himsel...

item.title: Mississippi, Not California, Is the Education Future
item.description: With reading scores nationally sliding the wrong way, Mississippi and the other Southern states offer a beacon of hope.

item.title: Justice Thomas Is Right. SCOTUS Has An Obligation To The Constitution, Not Bad Precedent
item.description: Associate Justice Clarence Thomas has often served as critical voice of reason on the U.S. Supreme Court. So, it wasn’t a surprise when he delivered a...

item.title: Feds to probe Des Moines schools on diversity hiring in wake of illegal immigrant schools chief
item.description: The Justice Department opened an investigation Tuesday in the diversity hiring practices of the public school system in Des Moines, Iowa, just days af...

item.title: Keep Listening To Kamala, Democrats
item.description: Democrats have once again decided it’s a good time to pick a losing fight because the party’s ridiculous, anti-American base can’t see anything throug...

item.title: Chuck Schumer Has No Leverage In The Shutdown Showdown
item.description: Republicans shouldn’t bail Democrats out of their own political problems; they should make Democrats swallow the bitter pill of surrender.

item.title: Trump threatens 'irreversible' cuts to federal programs if government shuts down
item.description: President Trump threatened Tuesday to make "irreversible" cuts to federal programs if the government shuts down.

item.title: The Left’s Love Affair With Terrorists Isn’t New — It’s The Playbook
item.description: If violence can be cloaked in the language of 'justice,' then terrorism is transformed into activism.

item.title: A Russian Defeat in Ukraine Would Help the West Elsewhere
item.description: The struggle in Ukraine does not end at Europe’s borders. Its outcome shapes the balance of power in the Middle East and Asia.
